revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:

|brand = LaCie |model = 5Big |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Network |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F5281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v5 (Feroceon) |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 400 / 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL032A90TFIR2; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5PS121621CFP-Y5; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1118; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:D0:4B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 2.4.9; |stockos = Linux;2.6.22.7;Marvell LSP 3.0.5;
|exp_if_types = SATA II, eSATA, USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 5 |exp_esata_num = 3 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 6.6 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = fan, metal case, RTC w/ battery, power switch, eSATA |addchip = 8-Channel SATA II Controller;Marvell;88SX6081;;1;,,, 4K 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Aplus Flash Tech;AF24BC04;;1;,,, In-System Programmable High Density PLD;Lattice Semi;LC4128V;;1;,,, I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, Fan Speed PWM Controller;Global Mixed-mode Tech;G760A;;1;,,, 4MHz PWM Buck Regulator;Micrel;MIC23051;;2;,,, 3A Peak Current Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;3;,,, 2.75-5.5V Current Limit Step Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG847B;;2;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT9214;;1;,,, 30V, 8.8A P-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS4435BZ;;1;,,, 30V, 11.6A N-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;;2;,,, 12-bit to 24-bit Multiplexed D-Type Latch;TI;ALVCH162260;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2008 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "5BIG_NAS_MB REV:3.0" and "2008.02.28" are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|LaCie 5Big Network 2|LaCie}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Marvell]]'' 88F5281 @500MHz ARMv5 Feroceon *Storage: 4MB (NOR) Flash, 5x SATA ports :3x eSATA ports *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 12V/6.6A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/lacie-5big-network-reviewed/ ''LaCie 5big Network Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.itpro.com/610665/lacie-5big-network-review ''LaCie 5big Network review'' on '''ITPro''']
